page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT
page.content: From a survey of 250 people living in Berkhamsted, we found that 27% work in the town. 15% work in Hemel Hempstead, 5% work in Watford, 4% work in Aylesbury, 8% work in Greater London, 21% work in Central London and 20% work in other places. 60% of these people drive to work, 25% use rail, 8% walk, 5% cycle and 2% use a bus. Their occupations include: advertising,architechture, BBC filming, banking, bookkeeping, building,butcher, civil service, cleaning, craftsman, education, electricity, flying, garage servicing, insurance, journalism, law, management, marketing, medicine, nursing, painting, photography, printing, police, post office, priest, publishing, retailing, research, secretary, security, social work, solid fuels,statistics, telephones.
